mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product_list WHERE iboard = ${iboard} ORDER BY iboard DESC
SELECT * FROM product_list A INNER JOIN t_board_sub_category B ON A.category_num = B.isubcategory WHERE iboard = ${iboard}
SELECT * FROM product_list A INNER JOIN product_detail B ON A.iboard = B.iboard WHERE A.iboard = ${iboard}
SELECT * FROM product_list A INNER JOIN product_detail B ON A.iboard = B.iboard WHERE A.iboard = ${iboard} AND B.color = ${color}

SELECT A.uid, A.sm, A.md, A.lg, A.xl, A.color, A.iboard, B.iuser, C.img_url_big, C.title, C.price FROM cart A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.uid = B.uid INNER JOIN product_list C ON A.iboard = C.iboard WHERE B.iuser = ${iuser}
SELECT * FROM product_list WHERE title LIKE '%${title}%' ORDER BY iboard DESC
